thread.title: Best motel I've ever stayed at, period.
thread.title_full: Best motel I've ever stayed at, period. - Review of Millwood Inn & Suites, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Nerad
title: Best motel I've ever stayed at, period.
text:
Title says it all, the best motel stay ever.
We were looking for a hotel to stay after a weekend in San Fran and close to the airport given our 7am flight. This motel did not disappoint:
1. Complimentary hotel shuttle to the airport.
2. Complimentary breakfast. Breakfast was supposed to start at 6am but it was opened early around 5:30am given our hotel shuttle time.
3. Good size rooms including 2 bedroom suite which we love.
4. Awesome comfy bed with nice bed linens. This bed is on par with luxury hotel chains.
5. Well maintained exterior - we've all seen your typical motel but this looks like you want to stay there.
Not sure what else to say other than awesome value for the money.
The motel was located approx. 1 mile from the BART station so not too bad a walk after coming from downtown.
If you were staying for longer, there is a Safeway and Trader Joes down the street as well as lots of food options.
Room Tip: Choose one of the suites for extra space See more room tips
